Minute Entry for proceedings held before Magistrate Judge David J. Waxse : A Scheduling Conference was held on 11/30/2004. Scheduling Order to follow. (This is a TEXT ENTRY ONLY for statistical purposes. There is no.pdf document associated with this entry.) (jm) (Entered: 12/02/2004)

SCHEDULING ORDER. Discovery is stayed pending ruling on the Motion to Dismiss. If the motion is denied in part or in total, the parties will be ordered to confer and submit a new Form 35 and a telephone Scheduling Conference will be held and a scheduling established for the case. Signed by Magistrate Judge David J. Waxse on 12/6/2004. (jm) (Entered: 12/06/2004)
